description:
Japanese journalist sent to Brazil to do a report on the gold rush phenomenon. Yuko is quite proficient martial artist (she trains karate). Reaching their destination, her crew member is promptly attacked and she is raped by Keisuke as a warning to stop their work and return immediately. She falls in love with Keisuke, and when her crew returns to Japan, she decides to stay in Brazil by his side. Keisuke opens to her and tells her the story behind his revenge. They later discover huge treasure of Portuguese origins which they want to use as tool to destroy GPX.
Yuko dies covering Keisuke with her body from submachine fire of some bandits who want to rob the treasure.
name: Kusaka Yuuko
